entries.name: new(markup = nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new ToAnsi visitor that is ready to output vibrant ANSI color!

entries.name: accept_list_item_end(list_item)
entries.desc: Overrides indent width to ensure output lines up correctly.

entries.name: accept_list_item_start(list_item)
entries.desc: Adds coloring to note and label list items

entries.name: start_accepting()
entries.desc: Starts accepting with a reset screen
